contents:
未成年人不判死刑属于基本人权的一部分，世界上只有两个国家会这么干，沙特和伊朗，你的榜样是它们吗

你漏了美国：“The United States Supreme Court prohibits execution for crimes committed at the age of fifteen or younger. Nineteen states have laws permitting the execution of persons who committed crimes at sixteen or seventeen. Since 1973, 226 juvenile death sentences have been imposed.” （ACLU）
